initial_filling.sentence: If you want to a________ your dream, you must work hard.

cloze_test.title: Learning a New Skill
cloze_test.content: Learning something new is never easy. Last year, I decided to learn how to swim. At first, I had no __1__ in myself. I was afraid of water. However, my coach __2__ me to try again and again. He said that __3__ is necessary if I want to succeed. I made a great __4__. After two months, I could swim very well. I realized that we should never __5__ giving up easily.
